property.name: Set
property.value: DMR-21 Team Hamukatsu and Dogiragon Buster

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Revolution 0 Trigger—Whenever a creature attacks you, if you have no shields, you may cast this spell for no cost. ■ Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a light or nature non-evolution creature, put it into the battle zone. Until the start of your next turn, that creature gets "blocker." At the start of your next turn, put that creature into your mana zone. After you cast this spell, shuffle it into your deck instead of your graveyard.

If your opponent does, return them to your hand. If your opponent doesn't or they can't, draw 2 cards.

property.name: Type
property.value: Forbidden Impulse

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This impulse starts the game in the battle zone with 6 seals on it. ■ This impulse can't leave the battle zone. ■ Forbidden Liberate: When this impulse has no seals on it, flip it to its creature side. {SEAL} (To seal a card, put the top card of your deck on top of that card face down. Whenever a Command is put, its owner puts a seal from one of their cards that has the same civilization as that Command into their graveyard. Sealed creatures are ignored.)
